Question: Chengdu Fscreen Sci-Tech Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Chengdu Fscreen Sci-Tech Co., Ltd.

Projection Screen

- Founded in 1999, specializing in projection display with core patent and independent technology
- Products include UST Fresnel laser TV optical screen, LT Fresnel projection optical screen, optical functional film, ultra precision roller mould processing, and extra-large size Fresnel lens customization
- Applied in scientific research, commercial, and household fields
- Established Fscreen photoelectric industry science and technology park in Chengdu Western Hi-tech district with 500,000 pieces optical screen production capacity
- Aims to provide the highest quality Fresnel optical projection screens and promote the ecological construction and development of the laser cast and projection display industry
- Showcased the Fresnel ALR Tri-Chroma Projection Screen at CES 2024
- Booth No: 50049, Venetian Expo, Halls A-D
Summary_cn:
成都市富领光电科技有限公司。

投影屏幕

- 成立于1999年，专注于拥有核心专利和独立技术的投影显示
- 产品包括超短焦夫琳激光电视光学屏、夫琳投影光学屏、光学功能膜、超精密辊筒模具加工和超大尺寸夫琳透镜定制
- 应用于科研、商业和家用领域
- 在成都高新区建立了富领光电产业科技园，拥有50万块光学屏的生产能力
- 旨在提供最高质量的夫琳光学投影屏幕，推动激光投影显示行业的生态建设和发展
- 在CES 2024展示了夫琳ALR三色投影屏幕
- 展位号：50049，Venetian Expo，A-D展厅
